content.question: In the third sentence of the fourth paragraph, the use of the simile “like a waking dragon” primarily serves to

choices.label: suggest the startling size of the autoclave
accentuate the anticipation felt by the child
dramatize the mechanical failures of the autoclave
emphasize the sensory experience of the child

content.answer: emphasize the sensory experience of the child

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
